TextLang.Text: Delete failed. The Memory Stick™ is locked.
The Memory Stick™ could not be accessed.
The system storage could not be accessed.
There is not enough free space on the Memory Stick™.
There is not enough free space in the system storage.
A connection error has occurred. The WLAN switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
A connection error has occurred. The WIRELESS switch on the PSP™ system is not turned on.
Press the ◀ button to go back, or the ▶ button to continue.
Press the ◀ button to go back.
The Memory Stick™ has been removed.
A connection error has occurred. You have been disconnected from the access point.
A connection error has occurred. You have been disconnected from the PPPoE server.
A connection error has occurred. There was a PPPoE communication error.
The Memory Stick™ cannot be read.
The system storage cannot be read.
Press the %e button to save settings.
Do you want to cancel? The settings you have made so far will not be saved if you cancel.
A connection error has occurred. There was a DHCP communication error.
A connection error has occurred. A PPPoE server was not detected.
A connection error has occurred. A DHCP server was not detected.
The port number is invalid. Enter a number from 1 to 65535.
Starting Internet browser... Please wait. After you have logged in, close the Internet browser.
A connection error has occurred. The signal may be weak.
A connection error has occurred. Please try again.
Connecting to the base station... Please wait.

This will guide you through the settings for using the LocationFree™ Player.
A LocationFree™ Base Station (sold separately) is required to use the LocationFree™ Player. The base station may not be available for purchase or use in some areas. Contact Sony Corporation for more information on the base station.
Basic settings will perform the following tasks to prepare for using LocationFree™ Player:
Adjust network settings to allow for connection to the base station.
Register the PSP™ system with the base station
Press and hold the [SETUP MODE] button of the base station until the [SETUP MODE] LED on the front starts blinking. If you don't press the button within 5 minutes, the operation will be cancelled.
You must update the base station to use the LocationFree™ Player. Press the %e button to start the Internet browser and open the update page.
The wireless channel of the base station is set to the 5 GHz range. You must set to a channel in the 2.4 GHz range to connect the system and the base station directly over a wireless LAN.
There are two or more base stations in [SETUP MODE]. Wait for a moment, and then try again.
The base station was not found.

Registration with the base station could not be completed. The maximum number of devices that can be registered has been reached. For details, refer to the operating instructions for the base station.
The PSP™ system is not compatible with this base station. Contact Sony Corporation for more information on the base station.
A timeout error occurred during setup.
You can save up to 10 network connections. Go to [Settings] > [Network Settings] to delete a saved connection.
This operation cannot be performed while disconnected.
Select a rate for video quality. The higher the rate, the better the picture.
Settings for controlling a device connected to a video input of the base station using the on-screen remote control of the PSP™ system.
Starts the Internet browser and opens the Base Station Settings page.
Settings for accessing the base station through a network device such as a router from outside the home. Usually, these settings do not need to be adjusted.
Select this option when using the internal TV tuner of the base station.
Select this option when using an external TV tuner such as a set-top box.

If the settings are correct, you can turn on and off the connected device. Connect the IR blaster to the base station, and then press the %e button. For details on the IR blaster, refer to the operating instructions for the base station.
Select this option if you are not using cable TV. Channels %1 to %2 will be available.
Select this option if you are using cable TV. Channels %1 to %2 will be available.
Settings for controlling a device connected to Video 1 of the base station using the on-screen remote control of the PSP™ system.
Settings for controlling a device connected to Video 2 of the base station using the on-screen remote control of the PSP™ system.

If the settings are correct, you can turn on and off the device connected to the video input of the base station. Connect the IR blaster to the base station, and then press the %e button. For details on the IR blaster, refer to the operating instructions for the base station.

To use a remote control, you must insert a Memory Stick™ containing remote control data. You can download remote control data from the site below. http://remote.locationfree.sony.net/psp/download.cgi Do you want to start the Internet browser and open this site?
There is no remote control selected. Select [Settings] > [Remote Control Settings] from the control panel, and then select the remote control for the connected device.
The remote control data is corrupted.
The system software of your PSP™ system is version %1. To use this remote control data you must update to version %2 or later. Go to [Settings] > [System Update] to update the system.
A connection to the base station could not be established. Another device is currently connected to the base station.
This PSP™ system is not registered with the base station. Select [Settings] from the control panel, and then start [Basic Settings] to register with the base station.
Press the %e button to disconnect and display the list of connections. Select the connection for accessing the base station.
Press the %e button to display the list of connections. Select the connection for accessing the base station.
The LocationFree™ Player will close. Do you want to continue?
You will be disconnected from the network to start Basic Settings. Press the %e button.
A connection error has occurred. You have been disconnected from the base station.
A connection to the base station could not be established.
Registration with the base station could not be completed.
Registration with the base station could not be completed. Please try again.
Change when you will not use the registered dynamic DNS, such as when using a different dynamic DNS or a static address.
Change when using the port forwarding feature of the router.
If checked, the domain name and port number will be automatically overwritten with the information saved in the base station during Basic Settings.
The PSP™ system does not support the security method of this base station.
Displays version information for remote control data saved on the Memory Stick™.
Displays version information for remote control data saved in the system storage.

The remote control data is version %1.
You can check the latest version at the site listed below. http://remote.locationfree.sony.net/psp/download.cgi Do you want to start the Internet browser and open this site?

The remote control data is corrupted.
To use, you must download remote control data from the site listed below. http://remote.locationfree.sony.net/psp/download.cgi Do you want to start the Internet browser and open this site?
You must download remote control data from the site listed below. http://remote.locationfree.sony.net/psp/download.cgi Do you want to start the Internet browser and open this site?
Select the channel for antenna output from the external tuner.

To perform this setting, you must insert a Memory Stick™ containing remote control data. You can download remote control data from the site below. http://remote.locationfree.sony.net/psp/download.cgi Do you want to start the Internet browser and open this site?
Sets the broadcast standard for the video inputs of the base station.
Select the broadcast standard for video 1 and 2.
When changing this setting, you will be temporarily disconnected and then reconnected. This operation may take some time to complete. Do you want to continue?
Automatically performs settings for LocationFree™ Player using the basic settings file of the Memory Stick™.
Automatically performs settings for LocationFree™ Player using the basic settings file in the system storage.
The remote control data will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?

There is no version information for additional remote control data. You can check the latest remote control data at the following site: http://remote.locationfree.sony.net/psp/download.cgi Do you want to start the Internet browser and open this site?
You can display up to %1 additional remote control data items.
A base station in [SETUP MODE] was not found. Refer to the instructions for the base station for details.
